text: Futhi (uMose) wangena edolobheni ngenkathi abantu balo benganakile wafica khona amadoda amaibili elwa omunye engoweqembu lakhe futhi omunye (engoweqembu) lezitha zakhe, ngakho-ke lowo ongoweqembu lakhe wacela usizo kuyena ukuze abhekane nesitha sakhe, ngakho-ke uMose wamshaya ngesibhakela wambulala wathi â€œlokhu kungomunye womsebenzi kasathane, ngempela yena uyisitha esicacile esidukisayo
